component.name: DeltaTouch
component.summary: Decentralized, secure messenger app, powered by the chatmail core library

description.p: Community-created messenger based on the chatmail core library, compatible with the official Delta Chat clients.

screenshot.caption: List overview of chats on a mobile device

ul.li: Feature: Experimental call support
Feature: Push notifications on UT via using push.ubports.com
Feature: Jump to quoted message in separate chat
Feature: Jump history
Feature: Allow to select and copy text in messages
UI: Move all experimental settings to Advanced
UI: Cover channels by experimental features switch as well
UI: Show email addresses of group members for unencrypted chats
UI: Rework UI/UX for emoji reactions
UI: Render emoji in fallback avatar if name of chat/contact starts with emoji
Build: Add warnings CI
Build: Regenerate .pot file only explicitly
Build: CI: build click only for arm64
Other: Disable screen saver on UT during several actions
Other: Use display name of contacts for exporting vcards
Other: Use chatmail/core v2.22.0
Other: Disable deprecation warning qt.qml.connections
Other: Webxdc: Take care of URLs received via newViewRequested
Other: Webxdc: Polyfill for crypto.randomUUID
Other: Remove dbus for sending URL to running application (use LocalSocket)
Bugfix: Fix editing names of contacts
Bugfix: Correctly place "ephemeral messages" icon in chat header
Bugfix: Use dc_lookup_contact_id_by_addr() to handle internal mailto: requests
Bugfix: Fix removal of notifications on UT 24.04 (different signature of DBus method ClearPersistent)
